Gordon -

First of all, thanks for all of the wonderful information!  I don=
't remember the last time that I got such a great response from anyone on a=
ny forum in a very long time!  :)  Both thorough and technical - your repli=
es answered my question and got me to the point where I can't wait to fire =
up heritrix again this evening to start up another crawl!

I will get the l=
atest java version, increase the file descriptors, and also switch to ARC f=
ormat which I'm hoping will fix my issues (and I'll turn on the robots.txt =
stuff too).  :)

Thanks again for the wonderful response(s).

- Steve
